items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy little eye catching dress!
items.body: This dress is so sexy! If you want to look & feel hot then this will do the trick! Incredibly soft fabric against the skin as well as the outer side! I got it in red & the color is so rich! Very very tight, form fitting dress. Fit as expected. Nice & short, almost a little too short but very manageable. I bought this for my husband's Christmas party & then couldn't even go due to hubby's coworker getting covid! So I sent the dress back although there was no other reason to do so. Great price point & very well made dress! Go ahead and have some fun & order one! Read more
items.author: Livory

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality dress for a costume
items.body: Very cute. I used as part of a costume. The material was not itchy or see through. Itâ€™s the perfect red for a king or queen costume and a Christmas outfit. Read more
items.author: Maria Cabasos

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sexy Dress!
items.body: This is a very sexy dress that still looks classy. I got a size medium and it fit me like a glove. Thereâ€™s plenty of stretch in this dress and for reference Iâ€™m 5â€˜1â€œ and I weigh 143 pounds. I couldnâ€™t wear a bra with this dress because the very open square neck line shows your bra straps. The material is a little on the thin side, but it totally is worth it for a fancier night out when youâ€™re on a budget. Read more

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible sizing
items.body: Item ordered in a bigger size and still comes way to extremely tight. As you walk your dress slips more and more up exposing your butt. Read more
items.author: Krystal hurt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Order up for more coverage
items.body: Trying to agree on a dress for my 13 year old's Valentines dance has been a mess! I found this and thought maybe if I ordered up a size (to a lrg), that it would cover enough and I could deal with the form fitting. It worked!! And, it's not like spandex tight, either, so it honestly looks nice and classy!! However!! Having said that, if I had ordered according to her size (med), we'd be having a different reaction! Lol Just remember that ordering true to size might get you into a rap video. The dress seems very nice and well-made, too! I would buy again!! Read more
items.author: Jamie Lee

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Navy, Purple, Burgundy, Royal Blue, Black, Coffee, Emerald Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
